text:
つまりは、その気になれば人の住む場所や様々な施設、そして安全に歩ける道さえもボーダーには壊すことが可能なのだ。
だから、国はボーダーを警戒するしかない。
「まぁ、国が隊員たちが心配なのも本心でしょうね」
「確かに、子供が大人に無理やり戦わされているのなら止めたいだろうな」
根付と忍田がそう言う。
trans:
In other words, if they so desired, the Borders could destroy places where people live, various facilities, and even safe walking paths.
This is why the nation has no choice but to remain vigilant against the Borders.
"Well, I'm sure the government genuinely worries about the agents too," said Nezuki.
"True, if children were being forced into battle by adults, they'd want to put a stop to it,"
added Shinoda.
